name: npm_sample_jQuery
description: タスクランナーのサンプル - jQuery

scripts.cssBuild: rimraf dist/css && mkdirp dist/css && npm-run-all -p css/page/*
scripts.css/page/index: node-sass --importer node_modules/node-sass-globbing/index.js src/pageIndex/scss/style.scss dist/css/pageIndex.css --output-style expanded && postcss dist/css/pageIndex.css -o dist/css/pageIndex.css && stylelint dist/css/pageIndex.css --output-file log/stylelintPageIndex.log
scripts.css/page/common: node-sass --importer node_modules/node-sass-globbing/index.js src/common/style.scss dist/css/common.css --output-style expanded && postcss dist/css/common.css -o dist/css/common.css && stylelint dist/css/common.css --output-file log/stylelintCommon.log
